rules.natural: If the research team publishes a retraction, then the research team does not initiate a replication study.
If the research team develops a synthetic compound, then the research team patents a new drug.
If the research team identifies a toxicity issue, then the research team does not patent a new drug.
Either the research team identifies a toxicity issue, or the research team discovers a manufacturing flaw.

rules.prover9_expression: (-(receives_funding(ResearchTeam, Grant) | (submits(ResearchTeam, Manuscript) -> accepted(Journal, Manuscript))) -> initiates(ResearchTeam, ReplicationStudy))
rules.natural: If it is not the case that either the research team receives grant funding or if the research team submits their manuscript to the journal then the journal accepts the manuscript, then the research team initiates a replication study.

rules.prover9_expression: (-(receives_funding(ResearchTeam, Grant) | (submits(ResearchTeam, Manuscript) -> accepted(Journal, Manuscript))) -> publishes(ResearchTeam, Retraction))
rules.natural: If it is not the case that either the research team receives grant funding or if the research team submits their manuscript to the journal then the journal accepts the manuscript, then the research team publishes a retraction.

If it is not the case that either the research team appeals a patent rejection or if the research team discovers a manufacturing flaw then the research team does not patent a new drug, then the research team receives an industry partnership.
If the journal does not accept the manuscript, then the research team develops a synthetic compound.

(A1 → G).natural: If the research team submits their manuscript to the journal, then the journal accepts the manuscript.

(A2 ∨ (A1 → G)).natural: Either the research team receives grant funding, or if the research team submits their manuscript to the journal, then the journal accepts the manuscript.

(A4 → ¬A3).natural: If the research team publishes a retraction, then the research team does not initiate a replication study.

(A5 → A6).natural: If the research team develops a synthetic compound, then the research team patents a new drug.

(A7 → ¬A6).natural: If the research team identifies a toxicity issue, then the research team does not patent a new drug.

(A7 ∨ A8).natural: Either the research team identifies a toxicity issue, or the research team discovers a manufacturing flaw.

(A8 → ¬A6).natural: If the research team discovers a manufacturing flaw, then the research team does not patent a new drug.

(A9 ∨ (A8 → ¬A6)).natural: Either the research team appeals a patent rejection, or if the research team discovers a manufacturing flaw, then the research team does not patent a new drug.

(¬(A2 ∨ (A1 → G)) → A3).prover9_expression: (-(receives_funding(ResearchTeam, Grant) | (submits(ResearchTeam, Manuscript) -> accepted(Journal, Manuscript))) -> initiates(ResearchTeam, ReplicationStudy))
(¬(A2 ∨ (A1 → G)) → A3).natural: If it is not the case that either the research team receives grant funding or if the research team submits their manuscript to the journal then the journal accepts the manuscript, then the research team initiates a replication study.

(¬(A2 ∨ (A1 → G)) → A4).prover9_expression: (-(receives_funding(ResearchTeam, Grant) | (submits(ResearchTeam, Manuscript) -> accepted(Journal, Manuscript))) -> publishes(ResearchTeam, Retraction))
(¬(A2 ∨ (A1 → G)) → A4).natural: If it is not the case that either the research team receives grant funding or if the research team submits their manuscript to the journal then the journal accepts the manuscript, then the research team publishes a retraction.

(¬(A2 ∨ (A1 → G)) → ¬A3).natural: If it is not the case that either the research team receives grant funding or if the research team submits their manuscript to the journal then the journal accepts the manuscript, then the research team does not initiate a replication study.

(¬(A9 ∨ (A8 → ¬A6)) → A10).natural: If it is not the case that either the research team appeals a patent rejection or if the research team discovers a manufacturing flaw then the research team does not patent a new drug, then the research team receives an industry partnership.

(¬G → A5).natural: If the journal does not accept the manuscript, then the research team develops a synthetic compound.
